## üéØ How to Use Upload File

üì∏ Open the quick capture bar.

‚¨ÜÔ∏è Click the Upload icon to start the process.

üì§ A file browser window will open‚Äîsimply choose the image or document you want to upload.

üñ±Ô∏è Once selected, your file will appear as a new Dot where you can annotate, comment, or start a thread.

### üí° Tips

* Add short explanations or steps to give your uploaded file more context.

* Ideal when you already have screenshots or documents saved on your device.

* Upload allows you to centralize all your visuals inside DOT for easy access.
